actors.name: Borrower
actors.summary: Users who borrow DFID by providing collateral in Safes.

actions.name: Open Safe
actions.summary: Opens a new Safe (Collateralized Debt Position) with a specified ID and collateral amount.

actions.name: Close Safe
actions.summary: Closes an existing Safe, identified by its ID.

actions.name: Borrow
actions.summary: Borrows a specified amount against a Safe.

actions.name: Repay
actions.summary: Repays a portion of the debt associated with a Safe.

actions.name: Add Collateral
actions.summary: Adds collateral to an existing Safe.

actions.name: Withdraw Collateral
actions.summary: Withdraws collateral from an existing Safe.

actions.name: Fee Topup
actions.summary: Tops up the fees associated with a Safe.

actions.name: Redeem
actions.summary: Redeems a specified amount of the stablecoin.

actors.name: Stability Provider
actors.summary: Users who deposit DFID into the Stability Pool to earn rewards.

actions.name: Stake
actions.summary: Stakes tokens into the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Unstake
actions.summary: Unstakes tokens from the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Claim
actions.summary: Claims rewards from the Stability Pool.

actors.name: DFIRE Staker
actors.summary: Users who stake DFIRE tokens to earn protocol fees.

actions.name: Stake
actions.summary: Stakes DFIRE tokens in the contract.

actions.name: Unstake
actions.summary: Unstakes DFIRE tokens from the contract.

actions.name: Claim
actions.summary: Claims accumulated rewards.

actors.name: Protocol
actors.summary: The automated system managing liquidations and token supply.

actions.name: Liquidate Safes
actions.summary: Initiates the liquidation process for undercollateralized Safes.

actions.name: Execute Liquidation
actions.summary: Executes a liquidation within the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Mint DFID
actions.summary: Mints new DFID tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFID
actions.summary: Burns DFID tokens.

actions.name: Mint DFIRE
actions.summary: Mints new DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFIRE
actions.summary: Burns DFIRE tokens.

actors.name: Reward Sender
actors.summary: The authorized address controlling reward distribution.

actions.name: Set Stability Pool Rewards
actions.summary: Enables/disables rewards for the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Set SBR Staking Pool Rewards
actions.summary: Enables/disables rewards for the SBR Staking Pool.

actors.name: Redeemer
actors.summary: Users who redeem DFID tokens for collateral.

actions.name: Redeem
actions.summary: Redeems a specified amount of stablecoins.

actors.name: Admin
actors.summary: The administrator who sets contract addresses.

actions.name: Set Contract Addresses
actions.summary: Sets the addresses of important contracts.

actions.name: Set Stability Pool Address
actions.summary: Sets the address of the stability pool contract.

actions.name: Set StableBaseCDP Address
actions.summary: Sets the address of the stable base CDP contract

actors.name: Chainlink Price Feed
actors.summary: The Chainlink oracle providing price feeds.

actions.name: Fetch Price
actions.summary: Fetches the latest price from the Chainlink oracle.
